text: My table tennis training hall; spacious, high ceiling, near to water point and power points if you plan to use robot. Table 4 and 7 are closest to the power points. The tables are average only, though. Table 7 is slightly better and it's net is also usable as of Apr-2025. It would be better to bring own nets for certain tables since the provided nets are not good. It could be quite hot in the afternoon and evening, also and some tables will reflect evening sun; slightly cooler in night time 7 to 10pm as of Apr-2025.

The badminton court here is kind of old but relatively well maintained.

Location wise it's not that accessible as you would need to walk quite a fair bit from bus stop and even further from the nearest MRT station.

Clean pool with a gradual depth from 1.4m to 4m and a good pressure to it. Clear water as well!

Various sports for children and my gal enjoyed the beginner volleyball sessions. Value for money at $130 for 12 lessons.

Do note that usual days/times are restricted to the public.
Not so crowded, it is an amazing place to exercise and spend time with our friends and family

there are a lot of badminton courts and the showers are pretty decent. i quite enjoy my experience playing badminton here. there can be occasional breeze felt alone the walls but i think its still alright.
